errorCodes.brokenAccount: Unexpected problem with account. Restore account
errorCodes.wrongParameters: Some parameters on the form are incorrect
errorCodes.wrongCode: Account is already activated or confirmation code is incorrect
errorCodes.wrongCodeRestore: Confirmation code is already used or incorrect
errorCodes.forbidden: You do not have permissions to perform this action
errorCodes.accountNotActivated: This account is not activated yet. Send activation link again
errorCodes.accountBlocked: This account is temporarily blocked. Please try again in a few minutes.
errorCodes.cantEditYourself: Changing own permissions is not allowed
errorCodes.oldSafariNotSupported: Versions of Safari older than 10 are not supported
errorCodes.DUPLICATE_MEDIASERVER_FOUND:
Some server lists as existing in both Systems – in the selected and in the current one.
Remove offline and incompatible servers from each System and try again.
errorCodes.INCOMPATIBLE: Systems have different software versions. Please update both of them to the latest build.
errorCodes.FAIL:
System {{failedSystem}} is currently unreachable.
Try again in a few moments or contact support.
errorCodes.unknownMergeError: Unknown error. You can try to refresh the page and repeat attempt. If the problem persists – please contact support.

cameraStates.errorLoading: An error occurred while loading this video.
cameraStates.iOSVideoTooLarge: iOS does not support video larger than fullHD (2MP: 1920x1080).
cameraStates.flashRequired: Please install Adobe Flash for playing videos.
cameraStates.flashOrWebmRequired: Please install Adobe Flash orWebM codec for playing video in Internet Explorer.
cameraStates.noArmSupport: This browser or device does not support video playback from ARM-based servers.
cameraStates.noFormat: This browser does not support video playback from this camera.
cameraStates.ieNoWebm: Please, install WebM codec for Internet Explorer.
cameraStates.ieWin10: Please, use Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome browsers.
cameraStates.ubuntuNX: This browser does not support video from ARM-based servers. Please, use Chromium browser instead.

common.chromeCastWarning: Chromecast is resource intensive and may cause issues on your server.

voiceCommands.live: go to live | show me live
